data.title: Zavallilar — Fulton County Library System
data.meta_description: Zavallilar — Directed by Yilmaz Güney, Yildirim Önal, Güven Sengil. The Poor Ones tells the semi-melodramatic story of three poor friends who met in prison where have been sent to on various offenses. These three friends do not want to get out when they are released. What are Abuzer, Haci and Arap going to do when they will be out? They have no one, no jobs... Apart from Haci and Arap, everything will be the same for Abuzer, who doesn't know where to go. He will still be alone, starving on the streets of the big city. Featuring Yilmaz Güney, Yildirim Önal, Güven Sengil. Country of production: Turkey. Also released as The Poor.      Some World Cinema titles may contain mature themes or content. Viewer discretion is advised.

Featuring Yilmaz Güney, Yildirim Önal, Güven Sengil. Country of production: Turkey. Also released as The Poor. Some World Cinema titles may contain mature themes or content.
